programme.desc: Rio's mistress Lili got pregnant and went to see Nisa. Nisa was so angry and disappointed with Rio that they broke up. Nisa heals her heartache by climbing a mountain with Fajar. Reporters continue to chase Nisa and think Fajar is her new boyfriend.

programme.title: Samudra Cinta - EP 237
programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. But a secret between the Cinta family and the Samudra family makes their relationship complicated because there is a big secret about Cinta that can ruin their relationship.

programme.title: Love Story The Series S2 - EP 222
programme.desc: Kendra's meeting with Maudy began with an accidental meeting at the Villa, that's where Ken first saw Maudy and immediately fell in love. At first Maudy was disturbed by Ken's presence, the horse Maudy was riding accidentally got angry and fell into the river, not long after Ken jumped to save Maudy.

programme.title: Ramadan Menyatukan Kembali Keluargaku (SPC IDUL FITRI)
programme.desc: For the third Ramadan, Hardi didn't see Rosidin until he was searching for himself and almost lost. Fortunately, Sarah (Ajeng Kartika) found Hardi and promised to be more active in finding Rosidin. Hardi is very homesick and wants to break the fast together. Similarly, Rosidin misses Hardi and Sarah but is ashamed that he hasn't made it to Jakarta. Will Hardi meet Rosidin this time after he and Sarah move to Jakarta and get back together?

programme.title: Makan - EP 2

Situated on the French Riviera, between Monaco and the Italian border, Menton also enjoys an exceptional microclimate.

programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Histoires De Chiens Suisses - EP 1
programme.desc: The guard dog considers sheep as member of its own family. We accompany the masters and their dogs at work in the alpine pastures. An opportunity to find out more about their relationship and the hard work that the presence of wolves in the country implies.

programme.title: TV5 Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Top 14 Rugby Le Mag
programme.desc: Presenting the day's action in the Top 14, the French rugby championship, with summaries and highlights from the matches, players interviews and comments.

programme.title: Un Dimanche A La Campagne
programme.desc: A weekend together, far from the hustle and bustle of everyday life. A moment out of time to get to know one another, talk of love, friendship, life. In a house open to surprises and the unexpected, between emotion and laughter, each reveals the invisible thread of their personal story...

programme.title: L'amour Du Monde
programme.desc: Margaux, 15 years old, is spending her holidays with her father and his new partner. During an internship at a home for children in difficulty, she befriends Juliette, 7 years old, and Joel, a thirty-something fisherman returning from Indonesia. A meeting that will upend her summer...

programme.title: Avant-Garde
programme.desc: 1984, the French-German border. A gallery owner from Berlin is carrying with him a flagship sculpture of his collection to present it in a major exhibition. But on seeing the object, the French customs officer is hesitant: is it really an artwork?

programme.title: En Piste !
programme.desc: Pauline is the witness at her best friend's wedding and hopes to take advantage of this special day to get closer to the handsome Raphael. But she finds it hard to let her gaze stray from her handicapped daughter, Emma, who she didn't want to leave with a childminder.

programme.title: Magazine
programme.desc: TV5MONDE, the global French language network, offers the best television programmes from France, Belgium, Switzerland and Canada.

programme.title: Tendance XXI - EP 25
programme.desc: Cordovan hats, embroideries, fans, mantillas: Dior unpacks its cruise collection in Seville. The story of Napoleon's sleeve buttons. Atelier Tuffery and Saint James work together to relaunch an industry based on French expertise. How to wear thigh boots. Gilder and ornamentalist Sebastien Barbier gives yesterday's objects their original radiance.

programme.title: 39-45, En Sol Canadien - EP 11
programme.desc: Fascist ideology had spread far and wide, even as far as Canada. Claude Legault discovers more about Adrien Arcand, founder of a political party based on European fascism. Uniforms, swastika arm-bands, hate speech: it was all there. Canada had its very own Fuhrer!

programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: 39-45, En Sol Canadien - EP 4
programme.desc: For the allies, winning the war meant fighting in German-occupied territory. Missions for sabotage and intelligence-gathering were carried out in Europe by some of Canada's top spies. James Bond's creator even took his inspiration from one of them, Guy Bieler.

programme.title: Itineraires Paysans - EP 12
programme.desc: The different attitudes and approaches of French farmers in terms of the environment, economy and landscape. A practical way of understanding a region and its terroir through their working practices.

programme.title: Megastructures Romaines En Gaule - EP 3
programme.desc: With its 2,185 monuments, Paris is a world tourism capital. The City of Light also shelters ruins that bear witness to the Gallo-Roman period: a few metres from Place Monge, the Arena of Lutetia is amongst the oldest remains from these ancient times, along with the Cluny thermal baths.

programme.title: Littoral - EP 15
programme.desc: A magazine about the people of the sea. An invitation to set sail for a programme rich in voyages, discoveries and fascinating encounters with those for whom the sea is their life, the ocean-lovers and the high-seas adventurers.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil - EP 1571
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: La Belle Vie - EP 2
programme.desc: Julien joins Vale and Alex, the nomadic pair behind the YouTube channel Prets pour la Route, ready to head off and discover Grand Manan Island. We discover their lives as content creators living in their 7m² caravan.

programme.title: Alfred Et Lucie Dreyfus, Je T'embrasse Comme Je T'aime
programme.desc: December 1894. Captain Dreyfus is sentenced to deportation for high treason. Lucie, his wife, agrees a pact with him: stay alive, whatever it takes, whilst awaiting rehabilitation. For five long years the couple exchanged hundreds of letters which were opened, analysed and censored by the French authorities.

programme.title: 6h Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Salle Des Profs - EP 20
programme.desc: A humorous look at working conditions for teachers through the trials and tribulations of five colleagues, unlike any others you've met.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Papilles - EP 12
programme.desc: The most Dutch of French chefs, Alain Caron, a real celebrity in the Netherlands, guides us across the canals of Amsterdam, his adopted home. A perfect opportunity to discover the festive, gourmet world of a restaurateur who has given French cuisine a voice in the local version of ''MasterChef''.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete in a game of arrow crosswords, trying to complete the grids by finding the answers to the definitions provided. But to have access to those definitions, they first need to answer questions that all share one common characteristic: the response is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'est Dans La Boite ! - EP 30
programme.desc: Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But what's inside? One thing is certain, it's bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects: from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!

programme.title: Les Souvenirs De Mamette - EP 44
programme.desc: Today a friendly 80-year-old grandmother, Mamette was once a headstrong young girl. At the age of nine, she discovered country life with no Internet or mobile phone. A great opportunity for plenty of adventures with her friends, when not taking part in the harvest or rearing goats!

programme.title: Les Comptines De Maryse - EP 18
programme.desc: Maryse asks Octave a riddle: what is her nursery rhyme about? A bowl of sticky stuff and pasty paste... Yes, it's all about glue.

programme.title: Foot Go - EP 4
programme.desc: Eight year-old Tata arrives in a new school. She wants to join its football team but isn't allowed to; after all she's a girl! Refusing to be beaten, Tata decides to set up her own girls' team with the help of her gang of friends.

programme.title: Alix Et Les Merveilleux - EP 37
programme.desc: Alix finds Humpty-Dumpty in a terrible state; he's just had a very scary ''nightmegg''! He's now so frightened of being left on his own that he's following Big Boss wherever she goes.

programme.title: PL MOMENTS - EP 3
programme.desc: Former Bolton, Newcastle and West Ham captain Kevin Nolan joins Will Perry to reveal his top ten moments in the Premier League.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 27
programme.desc: Coming from a successful footballing family, Javier Hernandez was somewhat destined for football stardom. Chicharito talks us through his fairytale move to Manchester United as well as his return to Mexico and his hometown team, Club Deportivo Guadalajara.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 14
programme.desc: Nemanja Vidic grew up in war-torn Serbia and went on to become one of the greatest defenders in English football. PL Stories sits down with him to explore his journey from Belgrade to Manchester. We also hear from former coaches and players about how his childhood shaped him into the person he is today and his lasting impact on the Premier League.

programme.title: THE CATCH-UP SHOW - EP 32
programme.desc: As the Premier League takes a break, the Catch-Up Show looks back at the best matches and analysis from the season so far.

programme.title: PREVIEW - FRI 28 MAR
programme.desc: This week, Preview sit down with Luis Garcia and Leon Osman ahead of the Merseyside Derby. Shay Given looks ahead to Newcastle United's match versus Brentford and Tim Sherwood and Julien Laurens discuss the London Derby between Chelsea and Tottenham Hotspur.

programme.title: CLASSIC MATCH 15/16
programme.desc: We delve into the Premier League archive to bring you a Classic Match from the 2015/2016 season.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 42
programme.desc: In this PL Stories show, Tim Howard, who has neurodiverse conditions, leads a conversation with past and present players, exploring the challenges and strengths of living with neurodiversity. Through personal stories, including those of Joao Gomes (stutter), Steven Naismith (dyslexia), Greg Halford (autism), and Charlie Austin (ADHD), the show celebrates resilience and the positive impact neurodiverse traits bring to the football world.

programme.title: PL REWIND - EP 8
programme.desc: Leon Osman recalls his favourite moments in an Everton shirt, from imitating a Premier League legend at White Hart Lane, to scoring in his 400th appearance for the Toffees.

programme.title: PL REWIND - EP 12
programme.desc: Jermain Defoe scored 162 Premier League goals, and it was at Tottenham where he was at his prolific best. The striker recalls his two spells with the North London club, including the memorable occasion where he hit 5 in one match.

programme.title: PL GOATS - EP 4
programme.desc: Luis Garcia and Gaizka Mendieta are presented with the challenge of deciding the greatest Spaniards to ever play in the Premier League.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 34
programme.desc: A product of Barcelona's famed La Masia youth academy, Cesc Fabregas is rightly remembered as one of the greatest midfield players of his generation. After making his Arsenal debut at just 16 years of age the diminutive Spaniard would go on to win titles in both England and Spain as well as becoming a World Cup winner in 2010. Now taking his first steps into coaching with Como 1907, Fabregas reflects on his footballing education as well as his hopes for the future in management.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 8
programme.desc: We delve into the careers of some of the most enigmatic and unpredictable footballers to have graced the English top-flight in recent years and find out how they became 'Premier League mavericks'. We get under the skin of what made these players notorious, controversial and flamboyant and the impact they had in their time in England.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 33
programme.desc: Arriving on Merseyside in 2004 as part of a freshly recruited Spanish contingent to help build a new-look Liverpool side, Luis Garcia soon became a cult hero at Anfield. But it wasn't always plain sailing for the Catalonian. In this week's Big Interview, Garcia shares the difficulties he faced adjusting to the Premier League, how Rafa Benitez managed to hone his talents and his thoughts on that famous "ghost" goal against Chelsea in the 2005 Champions League semi-final.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 43
programme.desc: Eduardo da Silva will forever be synonymous for suffering one of the worst injuries in Premier League history. We travelled to Brazil, Croatia and caught up with the former Arsenal hero here in England to find out more about the man who gave Gunners fans a fleeting glimpse of greatness before being so cruelly deprived.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 21
programme.desc: Before stepping into the dugout, Martin O'Neill was part of one of football's most iconic teams with Brian Clough's Nottingham Forest. Hear from Martin as he shares stories from his remarkable journey across nearly five decades in the game. From European heartbreak, to promotional triumph, discover what shaped his extraordinary career, both on the field and from the sidelines.

programme.desc: Arsenal legend and Invincible Gilberto Silva takes us back to winning the 2002 World Cup with Brazil, his early years at Arsenal and his first footballing steps in a small Brazilian town before he shines light onto the ever-famous Invincibles season with the help of Ray Parlour, Thierry Henry, Martin Keown, Patrick Vieira and none other than Arsene Wenger. Gilberto charts at all his personal and professional highs and lows.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 42
programme.desc: In this PL Stories show, Tim Howard, who has neurodiverse conditions, leads a conversation with past and present players, exploring the challenges and strengths of living with neurodiversity. Through personal stories, including those of Joao Gomes (stutter), Steven Naismith (dyslexia), Greg Halford (autism), and Charlie Austin (ADHD), the show celebrates resilience and the positive impact neurodiverse traits bring to the football world.

programme.title: FS MMA Jorge Masvidal vs. Keith Wisiewski
programme.desc: BodogFIGHT features classic MMA matches involving some of your favorite fighters! Future UFC contender Jorge Masvidal takes on Keith Wisniewski in Costa Rica.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Yuriorkis Gamboa vs. Marcos Ramirez
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features undefeated featherweights Yuriorkis Gamboa, 'El Cinclon de Guantanamo', (11-0, 9 KOs) and Marcos Ramirez (25-0, 16 KOs) from the Pechanga Resort and Casino in Temecula, California, USA, on October 4, 2008. The two young fighters had a quick ending street brawl that brought the crowd to its feet.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Victor Ortiz vs. Vivian Harris
programme.desc: Wide World Of Fights includes all styles of fighting from around the world in one show! This episode features a middleweight brawl between top contenders Victor Ortiz and Vivian Harris, as well as kickboxing, sumo, arm wrestling and more!

programme.title: Karate 1 Premier League
programme.desc: Dublin, Ireland welcomes one of the most anticipated events in Martial Arts this year as the Karate 1 Premier League returns. This will be the first Karate 1 Premier League event to take place in Dublin, with many of the top competitors in the world making the journey to Ireland for the first time and where the new Grand Winners will be crowned.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Sergio Martinez vs. Paul Williams (II)
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is the second encounter between middleweights Paul Williams and Sergio Martinez. This time around, championship gold is on the line in a bout that will not go the distance. Also on the card, Marcos Maidana tries to jump up a weight class.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 4 featuring Daieisho, Onosho, Abi and Takayasu from the Kyushu basho, 2019.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS WCK Jouri de Sousa vs Robin Ciric
programme.desc: WCK features intense, nonstop battles in both freestyle kickboxing and Muay Thai from around the world. It's kickboxing's most talented athletes at their finest! This episode, from Hamburg, Germany, features main event Jouri de Sousa (Angola) vs. Robin Ciric (Serbia).

programme.title: MEGA Fights Andre Berto vs. Carlos Quintana
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features undeafeated Andre Berto (25-0, 19 KOs) in his 4th defense of the WBC Welterweight Title as he takes on former WBO Champion Carlos 'El Indio' Quintana (27-2, 21 KOs) at the BankAtlantic Center in Sunrise, Florida, USA on April 10, 2010.

programme.title: Fight Quest
programme.desc: Episode 8: Rio de Janeiro, Brazil - Hosts Jimmy Smith and Doug Anderson learn the Fight Discipline of Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu and the Martial Art of Grappling with Masters Renato Barreto and Breno Sivak.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Lamont Peterson vs. Amir Khan
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Lamont Peterson facing Amir Khan in a light welterweight title bout that ends in a controversial decision due to a point deduction. Also on the card, heavyweight kickboxing action.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. Show 5 featuring Abi, Hakuho, Takakeisho and Asanoyama from the Kyushu basho, 2019.

programme.title: American Ninja Warrior
programme.desc: Thirty competitors return to the Rockies for the regional finals. The air gets thinner, and the competition gets fiercer as the contestants converge in the elevated battleground of Denver. To conquer the iconic course standing between them and glory, they must grapple once again with the Grip Hang. The contenders also encounter two new obstacles: the Floating Stairs and the Pole Grasper.

The fight took place at Boardwalk Hall in Atlantic City, New Jersey, USA, on July 9, 2011.

programme.title: Karate 1 Premier League
programme.desc: Dublin, Ireland welcomes one of the most anticipated events in Martial Arts this year as the Karate 1 Premier League returns. This will be the first Karate 1 Premier League event to take place in Dublin, with many of the top competitors in the world making the journey to Ireland for the first time and where the new Grand Winners will be crowned.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Floyd Mayweather, Jr. vs. Oscar De La Hoya
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a heavily-anticipated contest featuring two of boxing's greats - Floyd Mayweather, Jr. and Oscar De La Hoya. This fight set the record for most pay-per-view buys, as 2.4 million purchases led to over $135 million in revenue. The winner of this closely-contested bout would be WBC light middleweight champion.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 1 featuring Goeido, Ichinojo, Daieisho and Kotoeko from the Aki basho, 2019.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Dmitry Priog vs. Daniel Jacobs
programme.desc: This episode features a middleweight battle between Dmitry Priog and Daniel Jacobs that ends in a crushing overhand right, as well as kickboxing, sumo, weapons and more!

programme.title: MMA:30
programme.desc: This episode is highlighted by a heartfelt interview with the legendary MMA Hall of Famer Tito Ortiz that shows you sides of the former champ you never knew from his childhood to his love of fishing to the man he is today. We stop by "Cowboy" Donald Cerrone's ranch to see you don't need the flashiest training equipment to be a world class fighter. Plus Nate Marquardt gets his dream car and UFC ring girls bring us on a tour of a new gym.

programme.title: FDR (Franklin D. Roosevelt) - EP 2
programme.desc: As Hitler sweeps across Europe, Franklin prepares a reluctant nation for war. Following the devastating attack on Pearl Harbor, he leads America into the greatest conflict the world has ever seen.

programme.title: Forged In Fire (S8) - EP 48
programme.desc: Competitor turned Judge Ben Abbott remains undefeated in the forge, but soon that could all change. Two of the smiths who faced Ben in his very first competition are back to seek revenge.

programme.title: Ride N' Seek: Quest For The Priestess' Cloak - EP 3
programme.desc: Jaime makes way to the Philippines' Queen City of Cebu, where she conquers its roaring canyons, calms her nerves with some pythons, and harnesses her fighting skills in the country's first battleground.

programme.title: Ride N' Seek: Quest For The Priestess' Cloak - EP 4
programme.desc: In the majestic island of Bohol, Jaime sharpens her blacksmithing skills, follows in the steps of a resolute underground revolutionary, and learns a dying language crafted from human body parts.

programme.title: Lost U-Boats Of WWII - EP 4
programme.desc: With weather preventing Darrell Miklos and the team from diving from the boat, they attempt a risky strategy. Garth makes a solo journey to explore a deserted island where he discovers a mysterious cross.

programme.title: The Making Of: Crossroads, Maldives - EP 5
programme.desc: The final countdown to opening has begun, but there's still a host of jobs left to complete. This episode follows the work needed to deliver the small details that take a resort from good to great.

programme.title: The Making Of: Crossroads, Maldives - EP 6
programme.desc: With so much hard work required to get to this point, can the team carry out the incredible task of delivering peak service right from the word GO.

programme.title: Pawn Stars (S24) - EP 615
programme.desc: Rick prepares for battle over a pair of vintage posters, but will he win the war? Meanwhile, Corey takes a look at an old fireman's megaphone. Can he ignite a deal, or will he get hosed?

programme.title: The UnBelievable With Dan Aykroyd (S1) - EP 5
programme.desc: Did you ever wonder what it would be like to get attacked by a million bats with tiny bombs strapped to their chests? What about inflatable tanks, robot assassins, bazooka Vespas, war dolphins...

programme.title: Pawn Stars (S23) - EP 44
programme.desc: The Gold & Silver turns into the happiest place on Earth with sellers bringing in a variety of Disney items including a replica of the famous Jungle cruise ride. Will Rick's Disney dreams come true?

programme.title: The Food That Built The World (S3) - EP 12
programme.desc: When brothers Hector and Mario Boiardi open an Italian restaurant in 1924, neither man realises their quest to introduce Italian food to Americans will result in one of the nation's most iconic brands.

programme.title: The Mega-Brands That Built The World (S1) - EP 3
programme.desc: 100 years ago, shipping packages was slow, and shipping overnight was impossible, until two Seattle brothers risk everything to reinvent shipping packages for all.

programme.title: Pawn Stars (S24) - EP 616
programme.desc: Rick and Corey race to San Diego to take a spin in the classic car Hell's Chariot, from the movie Grease. Is the flaming hot rod the one that they want, or will they 'drop out' of the deal?

programme.title: The Art Of Washoku
programme.desc: Journey into the heart of Japan's culinary heritage with this program celebrating the beauty of washoku-Japanese cuisine. Explore the kaiseki ryori, a multi-course meal inspired by the changing seasons.

programme.title: History's Greatest Escapes With Morgan Freeman (S2) - EP 11
programme.desc: A lifelong escape artist, Forrest Tucker, ends up in San Quentin prison. But despite his advanced age, he manages to engineer one of the most audacious prison breaks of all time.

programme.title: The Bermuda Triangle: Into Cursed Waters (S2) - EP 6
programme.desc: The team heads to a target they believe to be the long-lost Marine Sulphur Queen. This massive tanker disappeared in 1963 with a crew of 39 and is one of the most iconic missing Bermuda Triangle wrecks.

programme.title: Booked: First Day In - EP 7
programme.desc: A teen gets nabbed for being in the wrong place at the wrong time, while a man who left town with a warrant gets caught when he returns for his aunt's funeral and faces a one million dollar bail.

programme.title: The First 48 (S24) - EP 475

programme.desc: When a father of two is shot dead while driving, detectives must retrace his steps to figure out who killed him.

programme.title: An Optimist's Guide to the Planet S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: How do you tell dusk from dawn in the age of climate change? Host Nikolaj Coster-Waldau begins his global journey to find out.

programme.title: An Optimist's Guide to the Planet S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: Shelter is one of humanity's most basic needs. As the global population grows, how can we rethink the way we live to build a more sustainable tomorrow?

programme.title: An Optimist's Guide to the Planet S1 - EP 3
programme.desc: Nature's ability to regenerate existed long before humans inhabited the Earth. What can we learn from its innate ability to help fix the damage we've done?

programme.title: An Optimist's Guide to the Planet S1 - EP 4
programme.desc: In a world where global warming has made food harder to grow, how we plant and harvest are critical issues when it comes to adapting to climate change.

programme.title: An Optimist's Guide to the Planet S1 - EP 5
programme.desc: Nikolaj meets people in Kenya, Switzerland and the US who are working to remove the three big hurdles between us and a true transportation revolution.

programme.title: An Optimist's Guide to the Planet S1 - EP 6
programme.desc: Nikolaj Coster-Waldau visits Germany where a port is working on the ultimate sustainable solution, and travels to Kenya and Greenland to learn how art and living in harmony can help humans.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: The demand for human eggs is booming, giving rise to a largely unregulated and dangerous marketplace. In India, we meet a teenage girl caught up in this fertility underworld.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates S3 - EP 4

programme.desc: How a US government agency set out to prove suppliers to research labs were importing wild monkeys from Cambodia with false paperwork.

programme.desc: Last year alone, an estimated $1 trillion was lost globally to fraud. With law enforcement struggling to cope, scambaiter vigilantes are filling the gaps.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates S2 - EP 3
programme.desc: A "shadow fleet" of aging tankers is keeping Russian oil flowing. Bloomberg set out to uncover the network of intermediaries working to sell the Kremlin's oil while getting rich in the process.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: In a Kampala slum, a group of midwives help vulnerable mothers give birth for free. Under a mile away, a private hospital is out of reach for most of the community, with devastating consequences.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates S1 - EP 2

programme.desc: The tale of the strange life and stranger murder of a rare violin collector and his daughter, as told by their friends and two suspects at the heart of the police investigation.

programme.title: Tough Trains

programme.title: The World From Above S2
programme.desc: The second series of The World from Above flies across some of the most beautiful and dramatic places in the world. In this series, we float over Venice, find four US presidents carved into the rock at Mount Rushmore, circle over twenty chateaux in the Loire Valley and fly up the Danube to find an enormous temple dedicated to Valhalla. We also discover the largest solar complex at Seville, explore the beautiful coastline of Maine and peer through mist at Mizzen Head in Ireland.

programme.title: Land Of Santri
programme.desc: Documentary program that tells the daily life of the students at the leading Islamic boarding schools in Indonesia. Land of Santri will open the eyes of the audience with a storyline that often describes the unique and positive curriculum on education in each pesantren so that it can produce quality graduates. The State of Santri provides insight that pesantren education has a quality that is not inferior to other general education.

Taeha was forced to become a state slave as he was wrongfully accused of stealing some provisions.

programme.title: Taxi Driver 2 - EP 14
programme.desc: The sequel continue to focus on the underground taxi company 'Rainbow Transfers' that offers a special 'revenge-call' services to its clients who have been wronged and helps them take revenge. Follow Do Ki's vengeful journey.

programme.title: Love Song in Winter - EP 23
programme.desc: Detective Jiang Chengyi (Huang Jingyu) and anesthesiologist Lu Yan (Sun Qian) unexpectedly reunite eight years after their breakup. Together, they solve a serial murder case, clear up misunderstandings, and rekindle their relationship.

programme.title: Warm on A Cold Night - EP 2
programme.desc: Qian Kingdom's constable Su Jiu Er (Li Yi Tong) possesses a rabbit-like cold-skinned spirit. She meets wolf-like warm-spirited Han Zheng (Bi Wen Jun) from Qi Kingdom's ruling family. This unusual duo forms a close bond as they investigate a strange murder.

programme.title: Truth - EP 5
programme.desc: Lin Yuanhao and Lin Lan represent the technical staff of the prosecution, using advanced professional technology to help prosecutors solve difficult cases and overcome "zero confession" cases.

programme.title: Love Song in Winter - EP 25
programme.desc: Detective Jiang Chengyi (Huang Jingyu) and anesthesiologist Lu Yan (Sun Qian) unexpectedly reunite eight years after their breakup. Together, they solve a serial murder case, clear up misunderstandings, and rekindle their relationship.

programme.desc: The sequel continue to focus on the underground taxi company 'Rainbow Transfers' that offers a special 'revenge-call' services to its clients who have been wronged and helps them take revenge. Follow Do Ki's vengeful journey.

programme.title: The Midnight Studio - EP 15
programme.desc: The series tells a thrilling story of mean photographer Seo Ki Joo (Joo Won) who runs a photo studio that exists only for the deceased, passionate lawyer Han Boo (Kwon Nara) and the eerie night visitors, who travel between life and death.

programme.title: Brocade Odyssey - EP 12
programme.desc: The story tells of Ji Ying Ying (Tan Song Yun) from the Huahua Dyehouse during the Tang Dynasty. She bravely faces foreign invaders and guards her dyeing techniques. Later, she creatively spreads these methods overseas, becoming the Dyeing Ambassador of Tang.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 1917
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Golden City - EP 589
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: Darkside of the Moon - EP 19
programme.desc: She Manyue (Tavia Yeung) appears to be a glamorous and skilled crisis management expert, but she has a tragic past. Eighteen years ago, she and her sister were assaulted by wealthy heir Jiang Jijun (Edward Ma), leading to a devastating upheaval in her family.

programme.title: Kill Me Love Me - EP 27
programme.desc: The story follows Prince Murong Jinghe of the Dayan Kingdom (Liu Xueyi) and a young girl Mei Lin (Wu Jinyan), from Qingzhou, as they support each other through the tides of fate. They bravely defy destiny, risking their lives to break free and persevere.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 1917
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Love's Rebellion - EP 28
programme.desc: Nan Yan (Jing Tian) joins the Yangyue Sect to study poison techniques in order to treat her mother's heart condition. She inadvertently forms a 'marriage bond' with Emperor Ji Yang (Krien Zhang) and gets entangled in a huge conspiracy.

programme.title: Love's Rebellion - EP 29
programme.desc: Nan Yan (Jing Tian) joins the Yangyue Sect to study poison techniques in order to treat her mother's heart condition. She inadvertently forms a 'marriage bond' with Emperor Ji Yang (Krien Zhang) and gets entangled in a huge conspiracy.

programme.title: Simple Days - EP 6
programme.desc: Gu Moli and Zhu Jincao struggled all the way from their hometown to set up a family of two in Shanghai. The marriage brought another problem that should not have been a problem - how they get along with their parents.

programme.title: Simple Days - EP 7
programme.desc: Gu Moli and Zhu Jincao struggled all the way from their hometown to set up a family of two in Shanghai. The marriage brought another problem that should not have been a problem - how they get along with their parents.

programme.title: Brocade Odyssey - EP 12
programme.desc: The story tells of Ji Ying Ying (Tan Song Yun) from the Huahua Dyehouse during the Tang Dynasty. She bravely faces foreign invaders and guards her dyeing techniques. Later, she creatively spreads these methods overseas, becoming the Dyeing Ambassador of Tang.

programme.title: Dead Ringer - EP 8
programme.desc: Chinese-American SWAT team captain Wei Xiao Chen (Chrissie Chau) destroys the base of a human trafficking syndicate, and discovers the body of a woman who turns out to be her twin sister. She is devastated and vows to track down the truth of the murder.

programme.title: Golden City - EP 590

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 1918
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Song Of Youth (TVB) - EP 31
programme.desc: Lin Shao Chun, the daughter of a formerly-powerful family during Ming Dynasty was left no choice but to join a performing troupe to stay afloat where she meets a rich heir, Sun Yu Lou. Will she pick love or seek justice for her family?

programme.title: Song Of Youth (TVB) - EP 32
programme.desc: Lin Shao Chun, the daughter of a formerly-powerful family during Ming Dynasty was left no choice but to join a performing troupe to stay afloat where she meets a rich heir, Sun Yu Lou. Will she pick love or seek justice for her family?

programme.title: Angel In-the-Making - EP 25
programme.desc: During their nursing internship at the hospital, final year nursing students, KI LOK (Eliza Sam) together with her classmates TANG LAI-CHING (Moon Lau) and YU YUET-OI (Jinny Ng), are assigned to a ward known as "Hell's ward" to receive training under the supervision of a registered nurse called YEUNG CHI-MING (Tony Hung).

programme.title: My Lover From The Planet Meow - EP 6
programme.desc: MIU MIU-MIU (Kristal Tin), originally from the Planet Meow, applies to live on Earth in a humanoid form to help solve the growing marriage problems between a physicist named SIT DING-KAP (Moses Chan) and CHIU YIU (Nancy Wu) so as to avoid the negative effects on her young master, SIT SZE-SZE (Celine Yeung). It turns out that, ten years ago, MIU-MIU took the appearance of a cat to be the pet of SIT's family and established a close bond with them.

programme.title: Born Rich - EP 4
programme.desc: Sophisticated banker CHEUK YAT YUEN (Lui Leung Wai) mistakes con artist SA FU LOI (Lo Ka Leung) for his half brother CHEUK YAT MING, fortuitously elevating the swindler to one of the leading figures in the banking industry. The lost and found brotherhood has blinded YUEN to FU’s real nature and intentions. _x000D__x000D_YUEN is kidnapped overseas by a group of rioters. He undergoes a dramatic personality change after the incident.

programme.title: Born Rich - EP 5
programme.desc: Sophisticated banker CHEUK YAT YUEN (Lui Leung Wai) mistakes con artist SA FU LOI (Lo Ka Leung) for his half brother CHEUK YAT MING, fortuitously elevating the swindler to one of the leading figures in the banking industry. programme.title: Captain Of Destiny - EP 2
programme.desc: While driving the police speedboat to hunt down a criminal, Cheung Chau police officer WONG TAI-MUI (Grace Chan) is accidentally caught in a waterspout and travels back in time two hundred years to the Qing Dynasty, where she encounters pirate CHEUNG PO-TSAI (Tony Hung) and the eleventh prince, MAN HO (Ruco Chan).

programme.title: Man In Charge - EP 1
programme.desc: Master TAI YAU KUNG (Lau Ka Fai) is skilled in training official advisor for government. He helps his foster son CHOW PING (Ma Kwok Ming) obtain a job in officialdom. PING is a resourceful young man but he holds fast to his own beliefs. He finds all the rules and practices of the officials intolerable so he stays idle all the time. Sometimes he goes tavern to have fun and he falls into the adorable owner CHONG SIU HAN (Leila Tong).

programme.title: Captain Of Destiny - EP 4
programme.desc: While driving the police speedboat to hunt down a criminal, Cheung Chau police officer WONG TAI-MUI (Grace Chan) is accidentally caught in a waterspout and travels back in time two hundred years to the Qing Dynasty, where she encounters pirate CHEUNG PO-TSAI (Tony Hung) and the eleventh prince, MAN HO (Ruco Chan).

programme.title: Captain Of Destiny - EP 5
programme.desc: While driving the police speedboat to hunt down a criminal, Cheung Chau police officer WONG TAI-MUI (Grace Chan) is accidentally caught in a waterspout and travels back in time two hundred years to the Qing Dynasty, where she encounters pirate CHEUNG PO-TSAI (Tony Hung) and the eleventh prince, MAN HO (Ruco Chan).

programme.title: Home Troopers - EP 6
programme.desc: All through the years, LAI KA-KA (Liza Wang) has been looking after her family so well that both her husband CHU KOT HO (Ha Yu) and her eldest son CHU KOT CHING (Kevin Cheng) look up to her as their temporal and spiritual leader. As KA is utterly resolute in her belief that she has got the best plans for her family, CHING has secretly invested in a domestic cleaning agency without consulting her, over which they have a terrible quarrel.

programme.title: Go! Go! Go! Operation C9 - EP 20
programme.desc: The organization to which agent C9 Yue Siu-Kiu (Samantha Ko) belongs is eradicated. Lonesome Siu-kiu encounters vegetable vendor Ko Tai-king (Kenneth Ma). After getting married, she takes care of her father-in-law Ko Au (Lee Ka Ting), big sister-in-law Ko Ching-lai (Yuen Kit Yee), younger brother-in-law Ko Tai-kiu (Brian Chu) and stepson Ko Hei-long, who collectively make up a dysfunctional family. She has become a proper housewife after five years.

programme.title: Righteous Fists, The - EP 6
programme.desc: Rewind to the 1930s and Bo Ching-wan (Ruco Chan) and his family have come to crime infested Tong Yan Street in Bangkok. His father Bo Tin-ha tragically dies after he has teamed up with Lin Chun-shan to rebel against Lo Heung-tung. Ching-wan’s younger brother and sister have also accidentally gone missing. His mother Ting Sai-fung (Yuen Qiu) has become emotionally unstable.

programme.title: LEGEND OF THE CONDOR HEROES (III) - EP 2
programme.desc: This costume Kung-fu packed serialized drama is an authenic adaptation of the most selling Kung -FU novel by the well renowned novelist KAM YUNG. This long series has been divided into 3 parts, each of these involved around individual story line and denotes a separate phase. Every part is complete in itself, yet, together they from a coherent whole.

programme.title: Blade Heart - EP 20
programme.desc: The Szema family murdered the Tong family in order to monopolize the weapons industry. Twenty years later, the chief of Brocade Guards, YUEMAN FUNG (CHENG SIU CHOW, ADAM), fights against MRS. WONG (WANG MING CHUN, LIZA) of the biggest escort carrier in town. During the fight, they realize they might know each other…_x000D__x000D_ FUNG has changed his name, put on an eye patch and become a Brocade Guard. His wife, TONG PIK, has married WONG.

programme.title: Blade Heart - EP 21
programme.desc: The Szema family murdered the Tong family in order to monopolize the weapons industry. Twenty years later, the chief of Brocade Guards, YUEMAN FUNG (CHENG SIU CHOW, ADAM), fights against MRS. WONG (WANG MING CHUN, LIZA) of the biggest escort carrier in town. During the fight, they realize they might know each other…_x000D__x000D_ FUNG has changed his name, put on an eye patch and become a Brocade Guard. His wife, TONG PIK, has married WONG.

programme.title: Sex Beyond The Grave
programme.desc: During World War II, a singer was raped and killed by Master Tao during her escape, with all her valuables stolen as well. Since then, the Tao's house became haunted. Years later, Master Tao's descendant sells the house to a young couple to pay off a massive gambling debt, but the couple soon discover that it is haunted by the vengeful spirit...

programme.title: Those Were the Days
programme.desc: Director Wong despises Cantonese movies of the 60s, but accidentally travels back in time to that movie set. He meets Director Chu, who tells him he can return to modern time if someone likes the film he makes. Wong meets four classic movie stars and invites them to star in his new film, but it flops unexpectedly. Can Wong return to the present?

programme.title: Wo Hu
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Police has placed more than a thousand undercover officers in various triad groups to bring down the largest criminal organization in Hong Kong. Betrayal, deceit and murder bring this group of "brothers" into a collision with the law and with each other!

programme.title: The Story of Woo Viet
programme.desc: Former Vietnamese veteran Woo Viet arrives a refugee camp in Hong Kong and meets his pen pal Quan. Subsequently, he encounters Shum Ching, with whom he attempts to flee to the US. However, the pair end up stranded in Manila's Chinatown, where at the hands of the local triads Woo becomes a hired killer, while Shum is forced into prostitution.

programme.title: The Eye
programme.desc: Mun undergoes a cornea transplant to correct her blindness, but ends up gaining more than the gift of sight. She shockingly realises that she is seeing another woman instead of herself whenever she looks into a mirror. Recalling that things changed ever since her cornea was replaced, Mun vows to uncover the truth behind her strange vision...

programme.title: My School Mate, The Barbarian
programme.desc: Edward attends a new school which has a reputation for fighting. Student leader Stone, befriends Edward, but their friendship is tested when a local triad leader discovers that Edward comes from a wealthy family.

programme.title: PTU
programme.desc: When OCTB (Organized Crime And Triad Bureau) officer, Sergeant Lo Sa, loses his police revolver to four triad young thugs, he seeks help from Sergeant Mike Ho of the PTU (Police Tactical Unit) to find his lost revolver. Ho and his patrolling PTU team has until dawn to recover the gun and clean up the mess.

programme.title: God of Gambler's Return
programme.desc: The God of Gamblers, Gao Jin, quits gambling and live a quiet life with his wife. However, a Taiwanese crime boss wants to become the new God of Gamblers and get rid of him, so he kills Gao Jin's pregnant wife to force him to the casino table. Gao Jin is indignant and vows to fight the crime boss to avenge his wife's death.

programme.title: Infernal Affairs
programme.desc: Yan is a police mole in the triad and joined them before he graduated from the police academy, while Ming is a triad mole in the police since young. Leading parallel lives, both men feel increasingly trapped in their false surroundings, and a series of cat-and-mouse chases ensue as both the triad and the police compete to uncover the other's mole.

programme.title: How to Pick Girls Up !
programme.desc: Xin, a helpless loser in love, calls in to a radio show hosted by DJ Tsang to ask desperately for help. A self-proclaimed love expert, Tsang takes it upon himself to make sure Xin meets girls and leads him on a series of absurd excursions into the wild and dangerous world of modern love.

programme.title: New Police Story
programme.desc: Senior Inspector Wing is an elite in the police force but has been drowning his guilt in booze after his entire team was killed by the "Gang of Five" in a mission. A year later, a young rookie detective with a complicated background is assigned to partner Wing and manages to inspire him into action, as Wing vows to take down the gang.

programme.title: The Chinese Feast
programme.desc: Sun wants to start a new life as a chef in Canada and struggles to learn cooking skills from a restaurant owner, Au. While Sun will represent his restaurant to participate in a cooking competition, his skill is not good enough, and he has to seek help from a legendary master chef in order to win the ultimate challenge.

programme.title: The Conman 2002
programme.desc: Li Ka Shing has lived his entire life as a luckless guy, until he is advised by a master to move his ancestral tomb so as to change his luck. From that day onwards, Li wins at every game in the casino. When his rival uncovers the secret, he destroys Li's ancestral tomb to gain the upper hand. Will Li win the finals of the gambling competition?

Chow Mo Wan encounters many women in his life but is touched by none after he lost his true love. Following an encounter one day, he decides to write a fiction titled "2046" which takes place at Room 2046. Nothing ever changes at Room 2046, and people go there to find their lost memories.

programme.title: Wonder Women
programme.desc: This is the story about a career woman and her friend going through life with their resilience and perseverance during the highs and lows of the Hong Kong economy over a decade, from the Handover in 1997 through 2007.

programme.title: Lifeline
programme.desc: A heroic tale about Hong Kong's brave firefighters. These courageous men can march into disastrous firegrounds and risk their lives to save others. However, do they have the same courage to confront their personal issues?

programme.title: Everyday Is Valentine
programme.desc: OK is a serial liar who constantly bends the truth to get his way. One day, he meets his dream girl, Wonderful and pretends to be a rich man in order to win her heart. However, Wonderful has sworn that she will never love a man who lies. Can OK stop lying and win his dream girl's heart?

programme.title: The Bare-footed Kid
programme.desc: A poor, bare-footed young man from the countryside arrives in the city to work with the friend of his dead father. When their dye shop is burnt down by a local strongman, he decides to fight back to protect all of them and save the shop.

programme.title: In the Mood for Love
programme.desc: This movie is Wong Kar Wai's most acclaimed feature, navigating the subtle love relationship between Chow Mo Wan and Su Li Zhen after both discover their spouses having an affair with each other.

programme.title: Prince Charming
programme.desc: Chen Li Pin, the nerdy son of a business tycoon, and his friend seek love in Hawaii. Returning home in disappointment, they accidentally find themselves in a messy identity swap. It is at this time that Chen falls for a beautiful girl May, who thinks he is a company chauffeur...

programme.title: Midnight Fly
programme.desc: With her marriage in crisis, Michele takes off to Europe for a vacation and meets a Japanese woman named Miki. As they become friends and travel together, Michele discovers that Miki is her husband's mistress. When Miki goes missing in Morocco, Michele does everything she can to find her but ends up paying a heavy price...

programme.title: Dummy Mommy, without a Baby
programme.desc: Fong Lai Kuen works at an advertising agency but is about to be sacked by her boss after offending him. She pretends to be pregnant so that the company cannot fire her, according to the labour law. Since then, Fong receives much care and love from her colleagues and begins to feel guilty about her lie as things develop out of her expectations.

programme.title: Undercover Hidden Dragon
programme.desc: In this hilarious comedy, Fat is a gangster who suffers from amnesia. Believing that he is actually an undercover policeman, Fat attempts to arrest gang leader Big Bro, but instead becomes the gangsters' best ally. To complicate matters further, a gangster named Wind, who looks exactly like Fat, starts a turf war with Big Bro.

programme.title: Let's Make Laugh II
programme.desc: Bodyguard Ah Sun is sent to protect his boss' son, only to meet and fall in love with his mistress, the gorgeous Joey. As love blossoms between the two, the powerful boss finds out and all hell breaks loose!

programme.title: 97 Aces Go Places
programme.desc: Hao Shi becomes the new triad boss after his father is killed by the pretty swindler, Ling. While professional gunman Drunken Gun is tasked to help Hao Shi take revenge, Ling is hunted by gangster Lei, from whom she has conned 2 million dollars. In the process, Hao Shi and Drunken Gun accidentally arrest Lei instead...

programme.title: The Myth
programme.desc: An archaeologist Jack, and a scientist William, stumble upon ancient Qin Dynasty artifacts that lead them to the mausoleum and mysteriously connects Jack to his past life as a warrior in ancient China, starting their mythical journey.

programme.title: The Story Of My Son
programme.desc: Li attempts to make a fortune at the horse-racing tracks, but is subsequently entangled with loan sharks. Li becomes debt-laden while his sons are harassed by debt collectors, when more heart-wrenching events begin to unfold.

programme.title: Miss Du Shi Niang
programme.desc: A famous prostitute Du Shi Niang has always hoped to find her true love in the brothel. Eventually, she meets a handsome student Li Jia and they fall in love at first sight. However, Du Shi Niang is suspicious of him and uses all means to test his love, not knowing that some people are just unable to stand up to the test...

programme.title: Diary
programme.desc: After breaking up with her boyfriend, Winnie starts to regularly write a diary and indulges in her own imagination. She meets Ray who looks exactly like her ex-boyfriend one day and they quickly fall in love, but the relationship soon fades away. Is Ray no longer in love with Winnie or is it just her imagining that he wants a break up?

programme.title: Face to Face
programme.desc: Tamotsu dies in a skiing accident and his roommate Yoshio marries his wife as well as inherits his entire fortune. At Tamotsu's funeral, Yoshio sees a badly disfigured old man and that is only the beginning of an evil downfall for him...

programme.title: The Voyage of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung continues his incognito voyage to southern China. Accompanied by the minister and the imperial scholar, they have many amusing encounters in Yangzhou.

programme.title: Super Inframan
programme.desc: Transformed from a young laboratory researcher, the thunderbolt-fisted Inframan must battle Princess Dragon Mom who wakes up from hibernation to conquer the earth with her army of mutant monsters.

programme.title: Inside The Forbidden City
programme.desc: Justice Bao discovers that Consort Li's new born son was swapped at birth and that she was expelled from the palace by Empress Liu twenty years ago. He sets Eunuch Guo up to confess his conspiracy with the Empress. Empress Liu is convicted for her act and Consort Li finally reunites with her son who is now the Emperor.

programme.title: Gambler's Delight
programme.desc: The Killer star Danny Lee plays the lead role of a guy who needs to become a hero. He lies, steals and cheats his way into operating a plush casino, but when he incurs the wrath of a female Japanese gang leader, all bets are off!

programme.title: The Imperial Tomb Raiders
programme.desc: The story revolves around a maverick, a band of woman warriors and a group of ruthless bandits. The maverick teams up with the woman warriors to battle the bandits seeking to raid the emperor's tomb.

programme.title: Shaolin Mantis
programme.desc: The Emperor orders Feng to find proofs of Master Tian's rebellion in his house. Feng falls in love with Tian's granddaughter and marries her. When he finds the proofs and tries to leave with her, his wife is killed in the fight against Tian. Feng creates the mantis-style martial arts and vows to avenge her death.

programme.title: The Twin Bracelets
programme.desc: Two teenage girls make a pledge to look after each other in a small Chinese fishing town, where the notions of women's rights or sexual freedom are absent. One ends up happily married to a stranger, while the other is cruelly betrothed to the abusive son of a wealthy family and has to seek to free herself from the situation.

programme.title: Return to the 36th Chamber
programme.desc: The second film of the trilogy, Gordon Liu plays Zhou Ren Jie, a man who impersonates a monk in order to learn kung fu in Shaolin, and eventually creates his own Shaolin style of 'scaffolding kung fu".

programme.title: We Love Millionaires
programme.desc: In this romantic comedy, three beautiful Hong Kong salesgirls travel to Osaka in Japan to pursue their dreams of marrying a rich man. They masquerade as high society debutantes and make their way to a posh resort to meet and woo millionaires (or fake ones!).

programme.title: Secret Service of the Imperial Court
programme.desc: Zhao Bu Fan is the sergeant of the government's secret police. Wang is a cruel and ruthless eunuch who takes over the Emperor's ruling power and leads the team of secret agents. After witnessing the atrocities committed by Eunuch Wang, Sergeant Zhao decides to defect but ends up being hunted by his friends, comrades and even his father.

programme.title: The Dream of the Red Chamber
programme.desc: Adapted from the great Chinese classic novel of the same name, the son of renowned Jia family, Bao Yu, is deeply in love with his cousin, Dai Yu. However, his mother disapproves of their relationship and plots to arrange Bao Yu to marry another rich girl, resulting in a tragic ending for the perfect couple.

programme.title: The Twelve Gold Medallions
programme.desc: This was one of top three films of 1970 and winner of "Outstanding Drama" at the 9th Golden Horse Awards. The evil minister uses twelve golden medallions to summon war hero Yueh Fei back from the frontline and execute him. A group of wandering warriors, led by Yueh Hua and Chin Ping, try to stop the medallion couriers.

programme.title: The Mermaid
programme.desc: Zhang and Jin's daughter, Peony, are betrothed at birth but Jin objects to the engagement now. Zhang meets a carp spirit that looks exactly like Peony and they fall in love. When Justice Bao is asked by Jin to distinguish Peony from her replica, he decides to quit the case when he witness the true love between Zhang and the carp spirit.

programme.title: Swift Sword
programme.desc: A righteous swordsman, Bai Yi Pang, seeks revenge on an evil clan but is crippled after being beaten up by them. Years later, a young man encounters Bai who is hiding in a cave. Bai decides to teach this determined young man his Swift Sword skills so that he can help Bai take revenge on the evil clan.

programme.title: Princess Iron Fan
programme.desc: As Monkey and his gang make their way to the West through Fire Mountain, they ran into the evil Princess Iron Fan, Madam White Bone and her sexy sister, and have to fight their way through.

programme.title: The Black Enforcer
programme.desc: Lung the Black Enforcer is ordered to escort a murderer Fei to prison. While taking shelter in Lung's house from the snowstorm, Fei is rescued by his gang and Fei kills Lung's mother and sister before escaping. Lung is imprisoned for the failed task and after being released, he vows to avenge his family by killing Fei.

programme.title: The Magnificent Concubine
programme.desc: Yang Gui Fei is the beloved concubine of Emperor Tang Ming Huang, who is so besotted with her that he leaves the running of the country to Prime Minister Yang Guo Zhong, the brother of Yang Gui Fei. The Prime Minister is corrupt and cruel to the army, causing them to revolt and endanger the throne. Yang Gui Fei is also implicated and kills herself.

programme.title: Empress Wu
programme.desc: Wu Ze Tian is a beautiful and talented concubine of Emperor Tang at age 14. She becomes a nun after he died but has two sons with the new Emperor Tang Gao Zong. The Empress asks Wu to team up with her against Consort Xiao, but is set up and dethroned by Wu, who also kills her two sons. After the Emperor's death, Wu becomes the first woman Emperor.

programme.title: The Water Margin
programme.desc: This is a martial arts epic directed by Chang Cheh. In the Sung Dynasty, the government is run by corrupt officials, so Sung Jiang gathers 108 outlaws at Mount Liang and establishes a band of patriotic heroes to end the repression of brutal overlords.

programme.title: My Name Ain't Suzie
programme.desc: Young Mei Li works as a bar girl in Wanchai to make a living. When she meets Jimmy in the bar, she thinks he is her true love and falls crazily in love with him. When Jimmy has to leave, Mei Li is devastated. It is not until she encounters the triad boss Ying that she finally found someone to count on.

programme.title: The Bloody Escape
programme.desc: Ku is a skilled Kung Fu artist brought up by the bandits and does not agree with the brutal leader of the bandit's camp. He rescues Tong, a young lady forced to become the leader's wife, causing both the authorities and bandits to come after them. Ku has to stand up against the bandits that he grew up with so as to start a new life for himself.

programme.title: Heroes of the East
programme.desc: A Chinese man marries a Japanese woman through an arranged marriage and manages to insult all of her Japanese martial arts family by issuing a challenge to her that is misinterpreted by the others. He must then prove how good Chinese Kung Fu really is through a series of duels with the seven Japanese martial artists who come to meet the challenge!

programme.title: The Deadly Knives
programme.desc: Martial arts student Yen returns from school to defend his family homestead against Japanese financiers after his father is killed. On the way, he meets Hua and falls in love with her. However, Hua discovers that her father is plotting with the Japanese to take Yen's property and wants to murder him. It is a tough choice between family and love...

programme.title: The Amorous Lotus Pan
programme.desc: Adapted from the renowned Chinese novel, The Water Margin, this is the story of a poor and beautiful girl Lotus Pan, who is raped by her master and had to be married off to a midget who treats her badly. Lost and lonely, Pan unwittingly becomes a pawn in the game of lust between her husband's playboy brother Wu Song, and a murderous man Men Ching.

programme.title: Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre 2
programme.desc: Only by bringing together the powerful Heaven Sword and the mighty Dragon Sabre can six martial arts sects struggling for supremacy be saved in this thrilling sequel to Chu Yuan's original hit.

programme.title: Return of the Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This sequel makes for more bittersweet laughs and heart-wrenching misfortune, as Ah Niu gets out of the jail to find his true love becoming the wife of an abusive husband, and his uncle further exploits his naive nature.

programme.title: The Kung-fu Instructor
programme.desc: Wong Yang is a famous martial artist who is forced to teach kung fu to the Mong Clan, an evil clan which is trying to destroy its nemesis, the Chow Clan. Chow Ping from the Chow Clan is a student of Wong's caught in the Mong's territory and as punishment, the Mong Clan wants to cut off Chow Ping's limbs. Wong steps in to defend his student.

programme.title: The Flying Guillotine
programme.desc: Ma Teng is an assassin of the 'Flying Guillotine Squad', a group of killers commissioned by the Emperor Yung. When Ma starts to question the morality of his missions, he finds himself becoming a fugitive hunted by his former comrades.

programme.title: That Fiery Girl
programme.desc: The bandits of Hulu Valley slay the chief of the Mei Clan while searching for a treasure map. In retaliation, Chun from the Mei Clan infiltrates the bandit's fortress to map a way in for the authorities, but ends up falling in love with the bandit leader's daughter, Pearl. While Chun's plot is uncovered, he receives unexpected help from Pearl.

programme.title: Genius Go Go Go
programme.desc: Hosted by Sam Tseng and Hsu Nai Lin, this top Taiwan variety show, splits celebrity guests into two teams to battle in various game segments.

programme.title: Genius Go Go Go
programme.desc: Hosted by Sam Tseng and Hsu Nai Lin, this top Taiwan variety show, splits celebrity guests into two teams to battle in various game segments.

programme.title: All About Health
programme.desc: How well do you know your body? What should you eat to be healthy and energetic? Are health tips available online reliable? Tune in to this programme as the hosts give you all the answers!

programme.title: Queen
programme.desc: From makeup, skincare, hairstyle, clothing, horoscopes, parenting, to travel, all kinds of fashion-related topics are presented in the program. Pauline Lan leads dozens of professionals and experts across categories to offer the best fashion insights and tips.

programme.title: Chop Chop Show

programme.title: Global Golden Line
programme.desc: It is the first professional reality car show, providing concrete evaluations of cars on the market, the deepest appreciation for classic cars, the hottest trends in the motoring world, and analysis of the latest auto tech trends.

programme.title: Atom Boyz Ⅱ
programme.desc: Atom Boyz II, Taiwan's most anticipated male reality talent show, features Ou Han-sheng, Hsieh Kun-Da, and Nine One One's Liao Jian-Jhih as celebrity mentors, with MuMu (Lin Wei-Ni) as the host. The 54 contestants are divided into six distinctively styled groups to compete fiercely against one another. How will they redefine the future of Taiwanese boy bands and become the next supergroup to take the Mandarin music scene by storm?

programme.title: 3 Kingdoms
programme.desc: Providing the best and the most exciting Taiwanese productions in Mandarin, TVBS Asia offers non-stop news updates, lifestyle and magazine programmes, star-studded talk shows, music, varieties and dramas that fit the needs of Asians with global perspectives.

programme.title: Beauty Lab
programme.desc: Beauty Lab is a program that blends "beauty" and "fashion." programme.title: Good Morning Hong Kong and Global View

programme.title: Al Cappuccino - EP 26
programme.desc: Struggling actor Cheung Sai Lun gets invited to act as the son of a mafia boss and somehow gets forced into becoming a police informant. While working with undercover Ko Ban, he experiences a series of extraordinary comedic events.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2522
programme.desc: Hung Shu-Kan owns a logistics business. The only thing on his mind is the well-being of his three daughters. His eldest daughter has moved abroad, but his second youngest daughter, Yuek-Shui, is still single. She and her little sister Sum-Yue often squabble, putting their father in a dilemma.

programme.title: Fantastic Feasts and Where To Find Them

programme.title: Yum Cha
programme.desc: Focusing on the rich heritage of Cantonese tea culture, this show delves into the history of traditional Cantonese tea houses, as our hosts visit old and new tea houses, interview dim sum chefs, and experience tea culture first-hand.

programme.title: News Treasury 2024
programme.desc: News Treasury 2024 takes everyone to uncover news from the treasure house. In addition to past specials, live broadcasts and reports, there are also precious clips from iconic events that have never been exposed.

programme.title: Taxi Driver 2 - EP 14
programme.desc: The sequel continue to focus on the underground taxi company 'Rainbow Transfers' that offers a special 'revenge-call' services to its clients who have been wronged and helps them take revenge. Follow Do Ki's vengeful journey.

programme.title: Under The Microscope - EP 14
programme.desc: The period drama revolves around mathematician Shuai Jia Mo who stumbles upon an old accounting issue in the local municipal level. While attempting to correct the mistake, he triggers tension with upper government officials.

programme.title: Warm on A Cold Night - EP 1
programme.desc: Qian Kingdom's constable Su Jiu Er (Li Yi Tong) possesses a rabbit-like cold-skinned spirit. She meets wolf-like warm-spirited Han Zheng (Bi Wen Jun) from Qi Kingdom's ruling family. This unusual duo forms a close bond as they investigate a strange murder.

programme.title: Truth - EP 4
programme.desc: Lin Yuanhao and Lin Lan represent the technical staff of the prosecution, using advanced professional technology to help prosecutors solve difficult cases and overcome "zero confession" cases.
